sailpoint.api

Class Matchmaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.api.Matchmaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityMatcher, IdentitySelector.MatchMonitor

    public class Matchmaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentityMatcher, IdentitySelector.MatchMonitor
    The evaluation engine for the IdentitySelector object.

      • PRAGMA_RELEVANT_APPS

        public static final java.lang.String PRAGMA_RELEVANT_APPS
        Pragma it is recognize in script and rule source to convey the applications involved. Should be specified in the rule or script source prefixed with '@' and followed by a comma-separated list of application names.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • isMatch

        public boolean isMatch(IdentitySelector selector,
              Identity identity)
                throws GeneralException
        Evaluate any of the matching rules in a selector against an identity. There is not usually more than one but if there are all must match.

        For script and rule selectors, remember the returned object. In addition to being logically true, in some cases (such as policy violation selectors) they are allowed to return an object that is used by the caller (for example, a custom-built PolicyViolation). To keep the signature simple, a simple boolean is returned for "truthiness" and the last value in a field that can be accessed with getLastMatchValue() saved.

        Specified by:
        isMatch in interface IdentityMatcher
        Parameters:
        selector - The IdentitySelector to evaluate.
        identity - The Identity to evaluate the selector against.
        Returns:
        True if the given Identity matches the selector, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getLastMatchValue

        public java.lang.Object getLastMatchValue()
        Return the value returned by the script or rule during the last call to isMatch().

      • getLastMatchApplications

      • getLastMatchApplications

        public void getLastMatchApplications(java.util.List<java.lang.String> names)
        Add the names of the matched applications from the last match evaluation into the given list. This is easier for policies that have more than one IdentitySelector.
        Parameters:
        names - The List of names to which to add the matched applications.

      • matchMonitorApplication

        public void matchMonitorApplication(Application app)

      • matchMonitorAttribute

        public void matchMonitorAttribute(Link link,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.Object value)
        IdentitySelector.match callback when a matching identity or account attribute is found. Link is null for identity attributes.
        Specified by:

      • matchMonitorPermission

        public void matchMonitorPermission(Link link,
                          Permission p,
                          java.lang.Object value)

        Specified by:
